extension.description: Features: - Panel, Horizontal, Vertical home views with two versions each. - Wall, Small list, Center List, Poster, Line views. - 1:1 realtime home design capability. Customized is at the top level, superb easy and fun! - RTL and LTR auto support mode. - Full mouse support. - AutoView support. - Choose varied of colors for almost anything! - Smart backup script. - Varied buttons and views effects. - Enchanced widget and network status. - Full genres support. - Some views have an additional special features. - Dynamic weather and widgets fanart (optional). - Interactive video window and OSD while navaigating. - Startup music and/or video (optional). - Smart subtitle module display current and history choosen subtitles, smart search and auto subs hosts finder. - ExtendedInfo support (Movies/TV/Actors/Directors/AutoComplete..)
